description:
When http://anidb.net/ch109981 [Letty] realizes he`s out of cash, he and http://anidb.net/ch109982 [Diaria] set out on a job hunt. Unfortunately, finding a job for a big, shy dragon is tougher than he thought--especially when some people are out to get him! 
Source: Funimation

titles.title: ドラゴン, 緊急事態.
